#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;
#define ULL unsigned long long
#define N 10000001
vector<ULL> fac(N,1);
vector<bool> A(N,1);
vector<ULL> B(N,1);
vector<ULL> C(N,1);
void preprocess()
{
	for(int i = 2;i<sqrt(N);i++)
	{if(A[i])
	{for(int j = i*i;j<N;j+=i)
	{A[j]=0;}}}
	int i = 0;
	for(ULL j=2;j<N;j++)
	{if(A[j])
	{B[i++]=j;}}}
ULL power(ULL a,ULL b,ULL c)
{
	ULL x = 1,y=a%c;
	while(b)
	{
	if(b&1)
	{
	x=(x*y)%c;}
	y=(y*y)%c;
	b/=2;
	}
	return x;
}	
const int NM = 2e5 + 10;
// const ULL MOD = 1e9 + 7;
ULL ans[NM];
int main()
{
	preprocess();
	for(int i = 1;i<NM;i++)
	{
	ans[i]=power(B[i-1],B[i-1],1000000007);
	}
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	cout<<ans[n]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
